item.title: Ill Chris,박재범 - Not the Same
item.description:
작곡: BOYCOLD / 작사: 박재범, Ill Chris
KY: 91971

Stunt on dat boi
stunt on dat boi
Man I done told U
we solid my boi
Man I done told U
we run it my boi
Jump off the cliff
don’t follow me boi
Leather and wood
engine that could
Check out the engine
that’s under the hood
Might just go pop but
we keep it the hood
Stuck in my ways
mobbin’ around
With a couple
of blades
Movin’ with razors
but never to shave
Man my whole life
I been under the shade
Feelin’ like blade
one in the K
Dxxx my whole life
I been under the blaze
Guess U ca say that
I’m ready to smoke
Slicin’ ya neck and
I’m comin’ for throats
Throwin’ up shots and
I’m watchin’ U choke
Killin’ the game is
murder she wrote
Seein’
these clowns
And I’m watchin’ ’em
float
Gettin’ the bands
flippin’
I’m winnin’
I’m gettin’ the bands
Really the man
fit is Japan
Where did I go
back on the grind
Back to the bag
all on my mind
Fxxx with my stats
all about grind
Up in the game
U ridin’ the pine
Runnin’ the game
we not the same
Fxxx U U lame
they know my name
I don’t want fame
I want to flames
I want to flames
yuh
Comin’ for smoke
U can look in my eyes
Crossin’ my heart
and I’m hopin’ to fly
Feelin’ like Pac
when I’m ready to ride
This is my life
and I’m ready to die
Runnin’ the game
we not the same

they know my name
I don’t want fame
I want to flames

yuh

and I’m hopin’ to fly

when I’m ready to ride
This is my life
and I’m ready to die
Puttin’ on
for the city
Jay and Chris
get it litty
Fresh prince
I keep it jiggy
Couple soju bottles
with me
We the sensaes
of this soju
We jumpin’ like pogo
get chicken like pollo
Puttin’ the game
in a chokehold
We kings
yeah
We royal get rings
like we frodo
Baggin’ this cash
uh yeah
Baggin’ it up
uh yeah
Never come last
uh yeah
Fxxxxx’ sxxx up
uh yeah
They sleepin’ on me
U can crash here
On Ur deathbed
I’m the next level
I’m the best ever
I’m a sect rebel
I get manchego
I spit dxxx fuego
I’m a axx cuelo
put hole in U
Like a dxxx bagel
I’m a detonator
I’m an elevator
I’m goin’ up
Homie see U later
uh yeah
My pass label
uh yeah
They wasn’t cuttin’ it
uh yeah
Started a label
uh yeah
Ask ’em
we runnin’ sxxx uh
Runnin’ the game
we not the same

they know my name
I don’t want fame
I want to flames
I want to flames
yuh

and I’m hopin’ to fly

when I’m ready to ride

and I’m ready to die
